title: i can't sign up for the pbe
body: i have tried every link and its the same thing error 500 i tried it in chrome and firefox same thing and googling a answer has not shown me anything please help.

replies.body: i give it 5 more hours for a response
well i hope this gets fixed in time for me to play kled i love ham champs
i also have restarted and had the same error
could it be a internet provider issue? is that possible?
same error for that link and i have disabled all extensions this time all that
is there a way to go right to the account creation page or have it set up with my same stuff for my NA or nah?

What happens if you go to this [link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)?  It goes directly to the application page.  Do you have any extensions running, and if so can you disable them?

so i tried all of that and i have the same issue

"· Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem."

I don't currently see any issues signing up for the PBE.  Make sure that you are going to the correct link [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  In addition to trying another browser, running Incognito or [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) could help resolve this.  I did look into your specific issue, and see that you've already successfully applied.  Best of luck!
